toast.heicDone: 🚀 Success convert HEIC image to JPEG.

err.videoCodec: ⚠️ Error load video: codec not support? try ffmpeg first.
err.motionCreate: ❌ Error create motion photo, check logs for detail.

toast.heicDetect: 📣 HEIC image detected, loading js module may take some time.
toast.motionCreate: 🚀 Success create motion photo, you can down(up)load.

tips.imagePrior: Image priority: raw motion > converted > raw
tips.motiontips: Suggest replace video part of motion photo only.
tips.createMotion: Confirm timestamp and video length before create.
tips.cutVideo: Extract image from video at position (s) with ffmpeg.
tips.multiCore: Multi-threaded core is faster, but unstable and not supported by all browsers.
tips.videoArgs: Set ffmpeg params, click button to apply current time of video
tips.setPixel: Set max pixels, keep original or reset with buttons on the right
tips.apiUrl: to represent file name in url;
tips.reqHeader: Click + to append and apply current http header
tips.uploadtips: The configurations will be saved to Local Storage if clicking top-right button
tips.cors: The CORS issue may exsits while downloading or uploading
tips.downloadtips: Cloud conversion need pre-upload, marking the file extension in url is recommended
